projects.title: Samsar
projects.description: A Flutter application tailored for the Tunisian real estate market. It serves as a platform for homeowners and real estate agents to list properties while allowing buyers and renters to browse listings on an interactive map. The appâ€™s flagship features are the many filters available, positioning, and search capabilities. Samsar aims to streamline property transactions and enhance transparency and accessibility.

projects.title: IndabaX 2024 Website
projects.description: A professional website made for the famous event IndabaX Tunisia, that was held on 18 & 19 May 2024, in supcom. It includes all the necessary preparations for hosting a website (MetaTags and Google SEO). made with Html, css and JavaScript.

projects.title: MoodMuse
projects.description: This Flutter application utilizes the device's camera to capture an image of the user. The image is then processed by an AI model to analyze the user's mood. Based on that mood, the application generates a music playlist to enhance the emotional state. The integration of camera functionality, AI analysis, and music recommendation makes this app an immersive and personalized experience for users.

projects.title: RC Car Controller
projects.description: A Flutter application designed to provide remote control capabilities for RC cars equipped with ESP8266 or ESP32 microcontrollers. It offers intuitive control modes, including a Button Control Mode to Navigate and steer the RC car using on-screen buttons. Gyroscope Control Mode that Utilize the device's gyroscope sensor. With HTTP Communication to ensuring real-time responsiveness and control.

projects.title: Chater CLI Tools
projects.description: A comprehensive suite of 16 powerful PowerShell scripts designed to supercharge your command-line workflow. The collection provides a robust toolkit for developers, automating everything from Git operations and secure secret management to system monitoring, networking tasks, and even direct interaction with Google's Gemini AI. Streamline your daily processes and boost your productivity directly from the terminal.

projects.title: Skill Issue Check
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, GEMINI API
projects.description: A tool that uses gemini to analyze documents (text, pdf), understand them, cuts them into parts and makes Multi-Answer questions so you can test your knowledge, with a hosted interface to show questions, give feedback and track progress.

projects.title: Real Time Sim of PV Performance Using PIL
projects.description: A project focused on simulating the performance of photovoltaic panels in real-time using a processor-in-the-loop approach with MATLAB and Simulink. With PV Fault Detection System. This project combines Digital Twin technology with Processor-in-the-Loop (PIL) testing to provide comprehensive fault detection, AI-powered analytics (Random Forest, XGBoost, Gradient Boosting...), trained with python, and embedded system validation.

projects.title: Education Help Gemini
projects.description: A web application that uses Gemini to help students with their studies, a literal chatbot. It allows users to upload a document, which is then processed by Gemini, users then can you their document page by page and with gemini on the side explaining and answering questions.

projects.title: The Flying Dutchman
projects.description: The Flying Dutchman is a Flutter-based mobile application that uses the Gemini AI API to provide users with instant answers to medical questions, specifically in the domain of human anatomy. Whether you're revising for an exam, teaching a class, or just curious, this app brings intelligent anatomy assistance right to your pocket.
